zodiac_signs.name: Aries
zodiac_signs.description: Aries are known for their courage, determination, and enthusiasm. They are natural leaders and are always up for a challenge.

zodiac_signs.name: Taurus
zodiac_signs.description: Taurus individuals are reliable, patient, and practical. They appreciate stability and are known for their strong work ethic.

zodiac_signs.name: Gemini
zodiac_signs.description: Geminis are adaptable, outgoing, and intelligent. They are known for their curiosity and love for communicating with others.

zodiac_signs.name: Cancer
zodiac_signs.description: Cancer individuals are compassionate, nurturing, and protective. They value family and close relationships and are known for their empathy.

zodiac_signs.name: Leo
zodiac_signs.description: Leos are confident, creative, and charismatic. They love being the center of attention and are known for their generosity and loyalty.

zodiac_signs.name: Virgo
zodiac_signs.description: Virgos are analytical, practical, and hardworking. They have a keen eye for detail and are always willing to help others.

zodiac_signs.name: Libra
zodiac_signs.description: Libras are diplomatic, charming, and fair-minded. They value harmony and balance in their lives and are known for their social nature.

zodiac_signs.name: Scorpio
zodiac_signs.description: Scorpios are passionate, resourceful, and determined. They are known for their intensity and strong intuition.

zodiac_signs.name: Sagittarius
zodiac_signs.description: Sagittarius individuals are adventurous, optimistic, and freedom-loving. They have a strong desire to explore the world and are known for their honesty.

zodiac_signs.name: Capricorn
zodiac_signs.description: Capricorns are disciplined, responsible, and ambitious. They are known for their practicality and ability to achieve their goals.

zodiac_signs.name: Aquarius
zodiac_signs.description: Aquarians are independent, innovative, and humanitarian. They value individuality and are known for their forward-thinking ideas.

zodiac_signs.name: Pisces
zodiac_signs.description: Pisces individuals are compassionate, imaginative, and intuitive. They are known for their empathy and ability to connect with others on an emotional level.
